metadata.title: CVE-2022-0144 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
shelljs is vulnerable to Improper Privilege Management

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0144` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-shelljs - 0.8.5+~cs0.8.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-shelljs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.5+~cs0.8.10-1').
